about_the_game:
Join Adira, a lost girl in a lost world, in her quest through the mysterious land of Solacinity to conquer her doubts.

  • Adira's trusty Double Jump will help you cross large gaps, weave between spikes and climb tall cliffs! Both of your jumps will replenish upon touching the ground or certain objects.

  • Solacinity is packed full of useful gizmos to aid Adira in her journey. Restore your jumps mid-air with ReJump Orbs. Take advantage of Springs to launch yourself in certain directions. Face a giant number of other challenges too, like Electricity puzzles, Teleportation Portals, Bosses, and even your own memories!

  • Each Chapter contains numerous optional Stars! Collect as many as you can for the chance to unlock some extra special content...

  • Fall down a pit, or collide with Spikes or other obstacles? No worry! You'll be brought right back to the start of the current room.

  • Experience the expansive story of Adira and Solacinity's other wanderers throughout your adventure.

    The lands ahead are unknown. That is, until you set out to know them...

short_description: Explore the strange lands of Solacinity in this Pixelated 2D Platformer! Take advantage of mechanics like Double Jumping, Springs, ReJump Orbs and more along your journey! Plus, collect enough Stars throughout the main campaign to unlock bonus post-game content!
